bibl.title: Women and the Comic Plot in Menander.
bibl.note: Based on a Ph.D. - 1. Those obscure objects of desire. - 2. Misperception of status. - 3. Misperception of character. - 4. Informing the audience. - 5. The women of the Epitrepontes. - 6. Why women? - Indices.
